001package io.jstach.jstachio.spi;
002
003import java.io.IOException;
004import java.util.ArrayList;
005import java.util.Comparator;
006import java.util.List;
007
008import org.eclipse.jdt.annotation.Nullable;
009
010import io.jstach.jstachio.JStachio;
011import io.jstach.jstachio.Template;
012import io.jstach.jstachio.TemplateInfo;
013
014/**
015 * Advises, intercepts or filters a template before being rendered.
016 * <p>
017 * This extension point is largely to support dynamic updates of templates where a
018 * template is being edited while the JVM is fully loaded and we need to intercept the
019 * call to provide rendering of the updated template.
020 * <p>
021 * The extension will only be executed if {@link JStachio} render (and execute) methods
022 * are used and not the generated classes render methods.
023 * <p>
024 * When JStachio renders a model through the runtime it:
025 * <ol>
026 * <li>Loads the template. In some cases it may use reflection and thus
027 * {@link TemplateInfo} may not be a generated {@link Template}.</li>
028 * <li>Loads the composite filter which is all the filters combined in order (see
029 * {@link #order()}).</li>
030 * <li>Calls {@link #filter(TemplateInfo)} on the loaded template which returns a
031 * {@link FilterChain}.</li>
032 * <li>Then tells the chain to {@link FilterChain#process(Object, Appendable) process} the
033 * rendering.</li>
034 * </ol>
035 *
036 * @apiNote <strong class="warn"> &#x26A0; WARNING! While this extension point is public
037 * API it is recommended you do not use it.</strong> It is less stable than the rest of
038 * the API and is subject to change in the future. Implementations should be threadsafe!
039 * @author agentgt
040 *
041 */
042public non-sealed interface JStachioFilter extends JStachioExtension {
043
044        /**
045         * A fully composed chain that renders a model by applying filtering.
046         *
047         * @apiNote The filter chain should be stateless and threadsafe as there is no
048         * guarantee that a filter chain will be recreated for the same {@link TemplateInfo}.
049         * @author agentgt
050         *
051         */
052        public interface FilterChain {
053
054                /**
055                 * Renders the passed in model.
056                 * @param model a model assumed never to be <code>null</code>.
057                 * @param appendable the appendable to write to.
058                 * @throws IOException if there is an error writing to the appendable
059                 */
060                public void process(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException;
061
062                /**
063                 * A marker method that the filter is broken and should not be used. This mainly
064                 * for the filter pipeline to determine if filter should be called.
065                 * @param model the model that would be rendered
066                 * @return by default false
067                 */
068                default boolean isBroken(Object model) {
069                        return false;
070                }
071
072        }
073
074        /**
075         * Advises or filters a previously created filter.
076         * @param template info about the template
077         * @param previous the function returned early in the chain.
078         * @return an advised render function or often the previous render function if no
079         * advise is needed.
080         */
081        FilterChain filter( //
082                        TemplateInfo template, //
083                        FilterChain previous);
084
085        /**
086         * Applies filter with previous filter broken unless the parameter template is a
087         * {@link FilterChain} or is a{@link Template} which generated renderers usually are.
088         * @param template info about the template
089         * @return an advised render function or often the previous render function if no
090         * advise is needed.
091         */
092        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
093        default FilterChain filter( //
094                        TemplateInfo template) {
095                FilterChain previous = BrokenFilter.INSTANCE;
096                if (template instanceof FilterChain c) {
097                        previous = c;
098                }
099                else if (template instanceof @SuppressWarnings("rawtypes") Template t) {
100                        /*
101                         * This is sort of abusing that filter chains happen to be a functional
102                         * interface
103                         */
104                        previous = (model, appendable) -> {
105                                t.execute(model, appendable);
106                        };
107                }
108                return filter(template, previous);
109        }
110
111        /**
112         * Hint on order of filter chain. The found {@link JStachioFilter}s are sorted
113         * naturally (lower number comes first) based on the returned number. Thus the filter
114         * that has the greatest say is the filter with the highest number.
115         * @return default returns zero
116         */
117        default int order() {
118                return 0;
119        }
120
121        /**
122         * Creates a composite filter of a many filters.
123         * @param filters not null.
124         * @return a composite filter ordered by {@link JStachioFilter#order()}
125         */
126        public static JStachioFilter compose(Iterable<JStachioFilter> filters) {
127                List<JStachioFilter> fs = new ArrayList<>();
128                for (var f : filters) {
129                        fs.add(f);
130                }
131                fs.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(JStachioFilter::order));
132                return new CompositeFilterChain(List.copyOf(fs));
133        }
134
135}
136
137/**
138 * Thrown if process is called on a broken filter. Currently this is a private API.
139 *
140 * @author agentgt
141 */
142class BrokenFilterException extends IOException {
143
144        private static final long serialVersionUID = -1206760388422768739L;
145
146        /**
147         * Invoked if filter is brken
148         * @param s message
149         */
150        public BrokenFilterException(String s) {
151                super(s);
152        }
153
154}
155
156enum BrokenFilter implements io.jstach.jstachio.spi.JStachioFilter.FilterChain {
157
158        INSTANCE;
159
160        @Override
161        public void process(Object model, Appendable appendable) throws IOException {
162                throw new BrokenFilterException("Unable to process model: " + model.getClass().getName()
163                                + " probably because a template could not be found.");
164        }
165
166        @Override
167        public boolean isBroken(Object model) {
168                return true;
169        }
170
171}
172
173class CompositeFilterChain implements JStachioFilter {
174
175        private final List<JStachioFilter> filters;
176
177        public CompositeFilterChain(List<JStachioFilter> filters) {
178                super();
179                this.filters = filters;
180        }
181
182        @Override
183        public FilterChain filter(TemplateInfo template, FilterChain previous) {
184                var current = previous;
185                for (var f : filters) {
186                        current = f.filter(template, current);
187                }
188                return current;
189        }
190
191}
